name: gpt-chat-manager
description: GPT聊天记录分类管理工具

scripts.electron:dev: npm run electron:build-main && concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run electron:build-main && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.electron:pack: npm run electron:build-main && npm run build && electron-builder --dir
